sql.query:
SELECT m_users.salt AS saltvalue, m_users.user_tpin, m_users.id, tat.ip_address1, tat.ip_address2, tat.ip_address3
FROM m_users
LEFT JOIN t_api_token AS tat ON (tat.user_id = m_users.id)
WHERE m_users.user_type = 5 AND m_users.u_status = '1' AND m_users.id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */ AND tat.status = 1

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM tt_recharge_trans
WHERE tr_id = :P1 /* {{ReqId}} */

SELECT api_code7 AS utilityopcode, api_code9 AS payone, op_id
FROM t_op_api_rel
WHERE api_code1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.OpCode}} */

SELECT t_op_api_rel.api_code1 AS ouropcode, t_op_api_rel.api_code7 AS utilityopcode, t_op_api_rel.api_code9 AS payone, m_api_fwd.service_id, m_api_fwd.api_id, m_api.api_name, m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password
FROM t_op_api_rel
LEFT JOIN m_api_forward AS m_api_fwd ON (m_api_fwd.operator_id = t_op_api_rel.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_fwd.api_id)
WHERE t_op_api_rel.op_id = :P1 /* {{GetOpCode.op_id}} */ AND m_api.status = 1
